prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon with vibrant antlers and a majestic aura.
I want a legendary creature that embodies the essence of life and nature.
Generate a fairy-type Pokemon with a sleek body and colorful features.
Make a Pokemon that has a beautiful, multicolored mane and a graceful stance.
Imagine a powerful being that can control the forest with its radiant energy.
Design a majestic quadruped Pokemon with an elegant shape and bright colors.
Show me a legendary creature that represents peace and harmony in nature.

distinctive_features: Radiant energy emanating from its antlers
